Corona Symptoms?
You can ask and consult an internist about corona symptoms through a free call, sponsored by the Ministry of Health and Population, from 8 am to 12 am.

All your healthcare needs Search and book a clinic visit, home visit, or a teleconsultation. Order your medicine and book a service or operation.
Verified patient reviews Doctor ratings are from patients who booked and visited the doctor through Vezeeta.
Your booking is confirmed Your booking is automatically confirmed, as the doctor specifies his working hours and is notified of the booking details.
Book for free, and pay in the clinic The consultation fees stated on Vezeeta are the actual doctor's fees with no extra charges.
